_header: I thank Thee Lord God full of might
_description: A morning thanksgiving to God — eleven 8-line stanzas

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
I þonke þe lord god ful of mihtwiþ al þat euer
                    I con & may…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Lord god Ihesu al weldyngeÞis day kepe me out of synne
                    Amen
